name: administrator
description: Able to perform all functions on behalf of DCC.

name: data submitter
description: Able to submit C2M2 datapackages and view submissions or submission status on behalf of the DCC.

name: review decider
description: Able to view submissions and submission status, as well as enter review approval decisions on behalf of the DCC.

name: reviewer
description: Able to view submissions prepared for review.
